header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Full-stack software engineer with 6+ years of experience building scalable applications and data platforms using Python, React, and modern cloud technologies. Proven expertise in AWS services, CI/CD automation, and both SQL and NoSQL databases. Strong track record delivering mission-critical systems at Disney that process millions of events daily, with experience supporting data science and machine learning initiatives through robust data pipelines and integrations.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Architected and maintained a streaming data platform serving 50+ engineering teams, building Python, Java, and Scala libraries for producing and consuming real-time events with AWS Kinesis and DynamoDB
Developed automated code generation pipelines producing Python data types and serialization libraries from schema definitions, enabling type-safe data handling across microservices

Built a stream-snapshot state management system enabling teams to derive application state from event streams, integrated into the company's unified content metadata catalog for television, movie, and sports content
Designed and implemented robust CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions with automated schema validation, backwards and forwards compatibility checking, and semantic versioning workflows
Engineered data lake integrations using Apache Spark, Databricks, and AWS S3 to transform streaming data for machine learning workflows and executive dashboard generation
Built data pipeline lineage tracking using OpenLineage and Marquez, developing a Java agent to automatically capture schema usage and encoding formats across distributed applications
Created comprehensive documentation sites using static site generation integrated with GitHub Pages for team onboarding and API reference materials

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Developed core blockchain platform components using Scala and distributed systems patterns, implementing proof-of-stake consensus algorithms and TCP-based peer-to-peer networking
Built a RESTful HTTP API for node management enabling users to configure blockchain nodes, manage cryptographic keys, and monitor network operations
Created a high-performance transaction streaming service using MongoDB for data indexing with a custom querying DSL, enabling real-time blockchain data analysis
Designed and implemented React user interfaces including an interactive transaction monitoring dashboard and a Chrome extension for virtual wallet management
Established end-to-end functional test suites using Postman collections and Newman test runner integrated with CI/CD pipelines

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Developed full-stack features for a construction project management web application using C# microservices, MSSQL databases, and Angular with TypeScript and RxJS
Architected an event-sourced change order tracking system with immutable audit trails and Kafka stream integration for real-time data synchronization with an enterprise resource planning system
Implemented complex data models and database schemas in MSSQL supporting organizational workflows for submittals, RFIs, issues, and document management
Deployed applications to Azure cloud platform using automated CI/CD pipelines and Git-based source control with Azure DevOps for ticket tracking
Collaborated in an Agile environment with daily standups, sprint planning, and retrospectives to deliver features on time

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Designed a comprehensive test automation framework using C# enabling both technical and non-technical team members to define and execute test scenarios
Built API testing framework for microservices validation and Selenium-based UI testing framework with XPath navigation for browser automation
Executed performance testing using JMeter and Locust to simulate thousands of concurrent users, ensuring application scalability and identifying bottlenecks
Balanced manual testing responsibilities with framework development, writing comprehensive test cases and improving quality assurance processes
